feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [baserproject/basercms] baserCMS Code Injection Vulnerability in Mail Form Feature
entry.content:
There is a Code Injection Vulnerability in Mail Form to baserCMS.

Target

baserCMS 4.7.6 and earlier versions

Vulnerability

Malicious code may be executed in Mail Form Feature.

Countermeasures

Update to the latest version of baserCMS

Please refer to the following page to reference for more information. https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161

Credits

Shiga Takuma@BroadBand Security, Inc

References

  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/security/advisories/GHSA-vrm6-c878-fpq6
  • https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-vrm6-c878-fpq6

entry.title: [baserproject/basercms] baserCMS CSRF vulnerability in Content preview Feature
entry.content:
There is a CSRF Vulnerability in Content preview Feature to baserCMS.

This is a vulnerability that needs to be addressed when the management system is used by an unspecified number of users. If you are eligible, please update to the new version as soon as possible.

Target

baserCMS 4.7.8 and earlier versions

Vulnerability

Malicious code may be executed in Content preview Feature.

Countermeasures

Update to the latest version of baserCMS

Please refer to the following page to reference for more information. https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161

Credits

Shiga Takuma@BroadBand Security, Inc

References

  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/security/advisories/GHSA-fw9x-cqjq-7jx5
  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/commit/874c55433fead93e0be9df96fd28740f8047c8b6
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-fw9x-cqjq-7jx5

entry.title: [baserproject/basercms] baserCMS Directory Traversal vulnerability in Form submission data management Feature
entry.content:
There is a Directory Traversal Vulnerability in Form submission data management Feature to baserCMS.

This is a vulnerability that needs to be addressed when the management system is used by an unspecified number of users. If you are eligible, please update to the new version as soon as possible.

Target

baserCMS 4.7.8 and earlier versions

Vulnerability

There is a possibility that information on the server may be obtained by a user who is logged in to the management screen.

Countermeasures

Update to the latest version of baserCMS

Please refer to the following page to reference for more information. https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161

Credits

Shiga Takuma@BroadBand Security, Inc

References

  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/security/advisories/GHSA-hmqj-gv2m-hq55
  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/commit/7555a5cf0006755dc0223fffc2d882b50a97758b
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hmqj-gv2m-hq55

entry.title: [baserproject/basercms] baserCMS Cross-site Scripting vulnerability in File upload Feature
entry.content:
There is a XSS Vulnerability in File upload Feature to baserCMS.

This is a vulnerability that needs to be addressed when the management system is used by an unspecified number of users. If you are eligible, please update to the new version as soon as possible.

Target

baserCMS 4.7.8 and earlier versions

Vulnerability

Malicious code may be executed in File upload Feature.

Countermeasures

Update to the latest version of baserCMS

Please refer to the following page to reference for more information. https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161

Credits

Shiga Takuma@BroadBand Security, Inc

References

  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/security/advisories/GHSA-ggj4-78rm-6xgv
  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/commit/eb5977533d05db4f3bb03bd19630b66052799b2e
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-ggj4-78rm-6xgv

entry.title: [baserproject/basercms] baserCMS Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability in Favorites Feature
entry.content:
There is a XSS Vulnerability in Favorites Feature to baserCMS.

This is a vulnerability that needs to be addressed when the management system is used by an unspecified number of users. If you are eligible, please update to the new version as soon as possible.

Target

baserCMS 4.7.8 and earlier versions

Vulnerability

Malicious code could be executed in the Favorites feature on the server.

Countermeasures

Update to the latest version of baserCMS

Please refer to the following page to reference for more information. https://basercms.net/security/JVN_45547161

Credits

ota kyohei

References

  • https://github.com/baserproject/basercms/security/advisories/GHSA-8vqx-prq4-rqrq

entry.title: [phpmailer/phpmailer] PHPMailer vulnerable to email header injection
entry.content:
Impact

Arbitrary additional email headers can be injected via crafted From or Sender headers.

Patches

Fixed in 2.2.1

Workarounds

Filter user-supplied values prior to using them in From or Sender properties.

References

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2012-0796

For more information

If you have any questions or comments about this advisory:

  • Open a private issue in the PHPMailer project

References

  • https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer/security/advisories/GHSA-398j-f7m7-795j
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2012-0796
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=783532
  • http://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=194015
  • http://www.debian.org/security/2012/dsa-2421
  • https://git.moodle.org/gw?p=moodle.git&a=commit&h=62988bf0bbc73df655f51884aaf1f523928abff9
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-398j-f7m7-795j

entry.title: [composer/composer] Improper escaping of command arguments on Windows leading to command injection
entry.content:
Impact

Windows users running Composer to install untrusted dependencies are affected and should definitely upgrade for safety. Other OSs and WSL are not affected.

Patches

1.10.23 and 2.1.9 fix the issue

Workarounds

None

References

  • https://github.com/composer/composer/security/advisories/GHSA-frqg-7g38-6gcf
  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-41116
  • https://github.com/composer/composer/commit/ca5e2f8d505fd3bfac6f7c85b82f2740becbc0aa
  • https://www.tenable.com/security/tns-2022-09
  • https://www.sonarsource.com/blog/securing-developer-tools-package-managers/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-frqg-7g38-6gcf

entry.title: [concrete5/concrete5] Concrete CMS Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Multiple Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Concrete CMS v.9.2.1 allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted script to the Header and Footer Tracking Codes of the SEO & Statistics.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-44760
  • https://github.com/sromanhu/ConcreteCMS-Stored-XSS---TrackingCodes
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-4qv6-37xq-mgq2

entry.title: [admidio/admidio] admidio CSRF Vulnerability
entry.content:
admidio 3.2.8 has CSRF in adm_program/modules/members/members_function.php with an impact of deleting arbitrary user accounts.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-8382
  • https://github.com/Admidio/admidio/issues/612
  • https://github.com/faizzaidi/Admidio-3.2.8-CSRF-POC-by-Provensec-llc
  • https://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/42005/
  • http://en.0day.today/exploit/27771
  • https://github.com/Admidio/admidio/pull/1074
  • https://github.com/Admidio/admidio/commit/a7ac9d3c9e0780e877fe9ac846ac64b284de8553
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c4v8-2hg8-jv77

entry.title: [omeka/omeka-s] omeka/omeka-s Improper Input Validation vulnerability
entry.content:
Improper Input Validation in GitHub repository omeka/omeka-s prior to 4.0.3.

entry.title: [artesaos/seotools] Artes達os SEOTools Open Redirect vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in Artes達os SEOTools up to and including version 0.17.1. This issue affects the function eachValue of the file TwitterCards.php. The manipulation of the argument value leads to open redirect. Upgrading to version 0.17.2 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is ca27cd0edf917e0bc805227013859b8b5a1f01fb. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier VDB-222233 was assigned to this vulnerability.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-36665
  • https://github.com/artesaos/seotools/pull/201
  • https://github.com/artesaos/seotools/commit/ca27cd0edf917e0bc805227013859b8b5a1f01fb
  • https://github.com/artesaos/seotools/releases/tag/v0.17.2
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.222233
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.222233
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-w2x5-hpmg-j98h

entry.title: [artesaos/seotools] Artes達os SEOTools Open Redirect vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in Artes達os SEOTools up to and including version 0.17.1. This affects the function makeTag of the file OpenGraph.php. The manipulation of the argument value leads to open redirect. Upgrading to version 0.17.2 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is ca27cd0edf917e0bc805227013859b8b5a1f01fb. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-222231.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-36663
  • https://github.com/artesaos/seotools/pull/201

entry.title: [codiad/codiad] Codiad information disclosure vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in Codiad 2.8.0. It has been rated as problematic. Affected by this issue is the function saveJSON of the file components/install/process.php. The manipulation of the argument data leads to information disclosure. The attack may be launched remotely. Upgrading to version 2.8.1 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is 517119de673e62547ee472a730be0604f44342b5. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. VDB-221498 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supported by the maintainer.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-20178
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/pull/974
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/commit/517119de673e62547ee472a730be0604f44342b5
  • https://github.com/Codiad/Codiad/releases/tag/v.2.8.1
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.221498
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.221498
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2q79-56rq-8v3c

entry.title: [wpcloud/wp-stateless] Cross-site Scripting in UDX Stateless Media Plugin
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in UDX Stateless Media Plugin 3.1.1. It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects the function setup_wizard_interface of the file lib/classes/class-settings.php. The manipulation of the argument settings leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be initiated remotely. Upgrading to version 3.2.0 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is 6aee7ae0b0beeb2232ce6e1c82aa7e2041ae151a. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. VDB-220750 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-4905
  • https://github.com/udx/wp-stateless/pull/630
  • https://github.com/udx/wp-stateless/commit/6aee7ae0b0beeb2232ce6e1c82aa7e2041ae151a
  • https://github.com/udx/wp-stateless/releases/tag/3.2.0
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.220750
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.220750
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9j2p-8qqf-h55c

entry.title: [mobiledetect/mobiledetectlib] Cross-site Scripting in MobileDetect
entry.content:
A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in MobileDetect 2.8.31. This issue affects the function initLayoutType of the file examples/session_example.php of the component Example. The manipulation of the argument $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] leads to cross site scripting. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 2.8.32 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is 31818a441b095bdc4838602dbb17b8377d1e5cce. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier VDB-220061 was assigned to this vulnerability.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-25080
  • https://github.com/serbanghita/Mobile-Detect/pull/741
  • https://github.com/serbanghita/Mobile-Detect/commit/31818a441b095bdc4838602dbb17b8377d1e5cce
  • https://github.com/serbanghita/Mobile-Detect/releases/tag/2.8.32
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.220061
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.220061
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-r77c-qv68-j3pp

entry.title: [mos/cimage] CImage Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in mosbth cimage up to 0.7.18. It has been declared as problematic. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file check_system.php. The manipulation of the argument $_SERVER['SERVER_SOFTWARE'] leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. Upgrading to version 0.7.19 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is 401478c8393989836beeddfeac5ce44570af162b. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-219715.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-15022
  • https://github.com/mosbth/cimage/commit/401478c8393989836beeddfeac5ce44570af162b
  • https://github.com/mosbth/cimage/releases/tag/v0.7.19
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.219715
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.219715
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6hv3-9fqx-8pg5

entry.title: [nonfiction/nterchange] nterchange Code Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in nterchange up to 4.1.0. It has been rated as critical. This issue affects the function getContent of the file app/controllers/code_caller_controller.php. The manipulation of the argument q with the input %5C%27%29;phpinfo%28%29;/* leads to code injection. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 4.1.1 is able to address this issue. The name of the patch is fba7d89176fba8fe289edd58835fe45080797d99. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-217187.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-10009
  • https://github.com/nonfiction/nterchange_backend/commit/fba7d89176fba8fe289edd58835fe45080797d99
  • https://github.com/nonfiction/nterchange_backend/releases/tag/4.1.1
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.217187
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.217187
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-cp2p-6xh4-jmcp

entry.title: [evolutioncms/evolution] Evolution CMS Cross-site Scripting vulnerability
entry.content:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in evolution v.3.2.3 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted payload injected into the cmsadmin, cmsadminemail, cmspassword and cmspasswordconfim parameters

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-43340
  • https://github.com/sromanhu/-CVE-2023-43340-Evolution-Reflected-XSS---Installation-Admin-Options
  • https://github.com/sromanhu/Evolution-Reflected-XSS---Installation-Admin-Options
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-432f-967f-vxg4

entry.title: [webpa/webpa] WebPA SQL Injection vulnerability
entry.content:
A vulnerability was found in WebPA up to 3.1.1. It has been rated as critical. This issue affects some unknown processing. The manipulation leads to sql injection. Upgrading to version 3.1.2 can to address this issue. The name of the patch is 8836c4f549181e885a68e0e7ca561fdbcbd04bf0. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component. The identifier VDB-217637 was assigned to this vulnerability.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-4308
  • https://github.com/WebPA/WebPA/pull/87
  • https://github.com/WebPA/WebPA/commit/8836c4f549181e885a68e0e7ca561fdbcbd04bf0
  • https://github.com/WebPA/WebPA/releases/tag/v3.1.2
  • https://vuldb.com/?ctiid.217637
  • https://vuldb.com/?id.217637
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-mjgw-f2c4-f8qj
